functionDecorators.name: activateForProtocol
functionDecorators.description: Activates pending votes (if ready) with a given validator group. Onus is on the protocol owners to activate to make sure CELO staked with protocol is staked on CELO L1.

functionDecorators.name: depositBP
functionDecorators.description: Allows deposits into the protocol's buffer pool to facilitate unstaking.

functionDecorators.name: getAccount
functionDecorators.description: Returns all details relevant to an account staking with Spirals.

functionDecorators.name: getActiveVotes
functionDecorators.description: Get active votes (staked + rewards) for this smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: getPendingVotes
functionDecorators.description: Get pending votes for this smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: setValidatorGroup
functionDecorators.description: For updating with validator group we stake with. Performs some simple checks to make sure address given is an eligible validator group (limited to 1 for now).

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Main function for staking with Spirals protocol.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Main function for unstaking from Spirals protocol. A particular user calling "unstake" adds a pending withdrawal for Spirals in the Celo smart contracts. After calling this function, a user officially unstakes but still needs to "withdraw" after the unlocking period is over.

functionDecorators.name: userCanWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Helper function for checking whether protocol can support a user who wants to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Allow user to withdraw their stake back to wallet. Withdraws from this contracts balance directly.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFirstRequestForProtocol
functionDecorators.description: Convenience function for withdrawing the first pending withdrawal request from the protocol.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawForProtocol
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws CELO from any pending withdrawals that are available. Onus is on the protocol owners to withdraw CELO from LockedGold.
